resources.string: 0) Welcome to the Etch a Sketch Calibration Wizard. [insert some weird clipart of a wizard for aesthetic purposes]
1) First, connect via bluetooth to the raspberry pi [insert appropriate stuff for bluetooth here]
2) I will now adjust Z height. Please clear the area so I can raise the Z [insert button that says "raise Z"]
3) Please put medium on bed so I can calibrate Z [insert a button that says "calibrate Z"]
4) Z calibrated successfully. I will now calibrate X and Y. [just a NEXT button here]

5-9) [this will repeat itself four times with different wording] use buttons to adjust [either top right, top left, bottom left, bottom right] corner of material. [laser cutter is at the lowest setting at this point, so you can see where it is pointed without damaging anything. in theory. User has as UP, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGHT buttons to move the laser for calibration, and can press a "finish" button when finished
10) See README for all the tasks app will do when calibrated. The will be more buttons and other fun stuffs here.
